t.id, t.search_key, t.module_name, t.parent_module_id, t.parent_module_name, t.template_type, t.module_type, t.icon, t.is_show, t.router, t.sort, t.is_link, t.link_url, t.router_str, t.template_id, t.create_time, t.create_by, t.update_time, t.update_by, t.remark
mapper.select: select , f.id as fid, f.ext, f.bucket_name, f.object_name, f.file_name, f.file_title from t_content as t left join t_file_data as f on t.data_id = f.id where t.id = #{contentId}

select c.id, c.title, c.id as content_id, t.module_id, m.router, m.module_name, m.template_type as temple_type, c.create_time, c.create_by, "single" as service_template_type, date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') as sys_date from t_content as c inner join t_single_template as t on c.template_id = t.id inner join t_module as m on t.module_id = m.id UNION ALL select c.id, c.title, c.id as content_id, t.module_id, m.router, m.module_name, m.template_type as temple_type, c.create_time, c.create_by, "info" as service_template_type, date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') as sys_date from t_content as c inner join t_info_template as t on c.template_id = t.id inner join t_module as m on t.module_id = m.id UNION ALL select m.id, m.module_name as title, '' as content_id, m.id as module_id, m.router, m.module_name, m.template_type as temple_type, m.create_time, m.create_by, "data" as service_template_type, date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') as sys_date from t_module as m where template_type = 5 UNION ALL select m.id, m.module_name as title, '' as content_id, m.id as module_id, m.router, m.module_name, m.template_type as temple_type, m.create_time, m.create_by, "service" as service_template_type, date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') as sys_date from t_module as m where template_type = 6
